text: Llanddulas Limestone and Gwrych Castle Wood is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in the preserved county of Clwyd, north Wales. The designated area lies in the communities of Betws yn Rhos, Llanddulas and Rhyd-y-foel and Llysfaen. The hills of Cefn-yr-Ogof and Craig y Forwyn feature. Gwrych Castle Wood is part of Gwrych Castle, a privately owned estate.http://www.gwrychcastle.co.uk Pen y Corddyn Mawr hillfort from Cefn yr Ogof ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Clwyd ==References== Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Clwyd Category:Betws yn Rhos Category:Llanddulas and Rhyd-y-Foel
title: Llanddulas Limestone and Gwrych Castle Wood
